text: “kavareku yam napurak sidu kaḷē da ē hā samāna deyak misa ohuṭa pratiphala vaśayen denu nolæbē. tavada yam pirimiyaku hō vēvā kāntavaka hō vēvā taman viśvāsavantayaku va siṭa dæhæmi kriyāvak sidu kaḷē da svargayaṭa pivisa, ehi kisidu gaṇanayakin tora va pōṣaṇaya denu labana aya vanuyē ovuhumaya.”
